title: Crater Lake National Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore       The Crater Lake Natural History Association is dedicated to supporting the educational and visitor services activities of the National Park Service. They operate bookstores at the Steel Visitor Center (open year-round) and Rim Visitor Center (summer only) to support this work. You can find more information on the Crater Lake Natural History Association and items available at their bookstores on-line.      NHA bookstore merchandise. NPS
